intro: Aneilema laxiflorum, commonly known as the broad-leaved aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its large, broad leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Aneilema laxiflorum is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and delicate blooms.
